InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: M6A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 4

Behring's M6A is a versatile high velocity energy autocannon, designed to provide to keep your enemy at range without sacrificing your stopping power.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

This military-grade component has been put through the paces by the UEE Navy, so you know the Maelstrom can handle the havoc of battle.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.
